Silent_Subtitle
Look, it's cracked! It was a rotten nut and a nut, it cracked just like that. So, look, the TNA coordinates are in your PDA. Anything you find, take it to Sidorovich. He's probably waiting for you.
All right, rat, I'll tell you. There's a case in the old mill. Under the roof.
All right, Rat, I say, in the tunnel, in the car upside down.
All right, Rat, I'll tell you, in a house not far from here, in the attic.
But do you see where your stubbornness has led? He didn't save himself, and he ruined Druzhkov. There will be no rescue operation. Tell me where you hid kay.
What do you want?
What else?
They won't let you rest, they keep coming and going, it's like honey.
It happens.
You're leaving? Well, finally.
Are you really leaving me? Oh, my God, what a blessing!
What are you hatching, like in a zoo?
What, it's interesting, huh? Oh, you're all so steamed up!
Well, rejoice, rejoice! Holecki is up against the cage!
Go on, mercenary!
Baba Swazu was in the know.
Get out before the first anomaly.
Well done! The military detachment has been wiped out! We've got a second squad of them at ATP. Mercenary, get over there!
Stalker detected! Fire!
Target lost! Duty Officer! Get your goblins up and sweep the sector!
Greetings, Stalker! Decided to place an order?
Hey! Decided to order something?
Hi! Do you need any merchandise?
There'll be stuff, don't worry, just later.
Come back later! The goods haven't arrived yet!
The order's not ready yet, so come back later, okay?
Order completed, pick up the goods!
I can be picked up.
Take the goods, Stalker. I've done my job.
Order fulfilled. You can pick up the goods.
Nyomnik, stay away. This is Stalker territory.
Nayomnik, stay away! Here, from stalker territory!
Stay back! Open fire!
Don't speed up! Open fire!
Mercenaire, you can't get in here!
Mercenaire, you can't get in here!
Mercenary, stay away. This is Stalker territory.
Stay back! Open fire!
Mercenary, you can't get in here.
Come quickly! The merchant put in a good word for you, Slovochka!
Come quickly, the peddler's made a promise for you, Slovochka.
Get a move on, they're waiting for you at the base.
Get a move on, they're waiting for you at the base.
Don't loom in front of my eyes, go to the base!
Don't loom in front of my eyes, go to the base!
Come quickly, the merchant put in a good word for you, Slovochka.
Hurry up! We're in the base waiting for you!
Don't loom in front of my eyes, go to the base!
We've been waiting for you. Get to the chief, quick!
Kassou, it's Valerian. We've been waiting for two days, but where are you? The situation is shaping up. Every table counts.
Oh, man, we can't get through to you guys. The anomalies have blocked the road, we're looking for a way through.
Vassili, remember you promised to help me with guns?
Valerian, I don't mind! You're one-eared! The military will ask me later, discard it. Why did you sell weapons to stalkers?
Vasya, think about it, if we don't nail the soldiers, they'll drink our last blood.
Good, Balyarian. Wait for tomorrow, man, he will deliver to you everything I have now.
Malerian, it's a potbelly. They say you're gathering stalkers around you.

There is such a thing. We've decided to fight back against the military, because they're really getting into it. It's gotten to the point where our people are being handed over to the bandits, and brazenly so.
Well, put me in, then. I have a long history with them. So I can be at your place tomorrow. Yeah, plus I got three other guys with me.
That's great! Thank you! We'll be waiting!
Hey, Goblin, you heard something.
The military just machine-gunned someone, but they still won't get far from the base. They're afraid!
Keep me posted if you need anything.

Good, now we have the strength to slap the neck of anyone who raises a hand against our brother. All right, guys, listen up. We need to seize control of the corpses leading to the cordon. If this thing works out, no gangster scum will come near our base.
A force of gangsters bigger than ours. That's the rub, you guys. If we don't level them now, soon we'll all be in the dump, ploughing the fucking landfill.

Did you do it? Now the bandits can't just sneak into the cordon. There's more to it than that. It's time to get ready to go to the dump. It's time we taught those bastards a lesson they'll remember us for the rest of their lives. And maybe even further.
Guys, listen to me. The bandits have set up a roadblock at the cordon. If we don't regain control of the cordon, it's the bastards that are gonna be coming in here.

Bingo. We're out. We've secured our position at the junkyard. For those of you who don't understand, I repeat. The way to the junkyard is open. The ting for entry is cancelled. That's it. You've got one last push. It's time to roll into their lair. Show the gangsters what a motherfucker they are.
Bollocks! We've been knocked out of the junkyard. All right, guys, it's not night yet, let's get together and beat the hell out of them.
That's it, we've sealed off the only way out of the bandit base. All right, guys! All right! Prepare to storm!
Attention all, the bandits organised a sortie with the base and destroyed a squad of ours. We need to block their exit at all costs before the bastards all crawl out.

This day will go down in the history of the zone. Congratulations to all the stalkers for completely defeating the bandits. That's it, no more kickbacks and bashing for rights of way. Happy victory to you guys!

All stalkers! This is Valerian. Bandits have flooded the dump again. I don't know where the hell they came from. Only now they're all over the place. Proceed with caution. Repeat. Everybody be careful.
It's like a Greek tragedy, a living soul in the realm of death.
You want to know the truth about the zone? Guess I do, too. Let's share information.
Well, get to work, mercenary!
I guess you're not as easy as you look.
Well go with God, good luck in your endeavours!
Something needs fixing.
Decided to improve what? Or fix a breakdown?
What can I do for you?
If you need anything else, stop by!
I'm sorry if I wasn't much help.
Find any upgrade parts? Pull it up, let's see what we can do!
Base! We need help! We've been ambushed by the military!
Help me out, brothers! We can't hold out much longer!
Pick the stalker you want.
What can I get you?
Anything for sale?
If you didn't find what you were looking for, I apologise.
Come back later, maybe I'll have something by then
It's nice to deal with an honest stalker!
Silent_Subtitle
